welcome: Welcome to the Ak Kayin Recreation Area!
welcomeMessage: Experience the atmosphere of comfort and coziness in nature. We are happy to see you here!
order: We have 10% service of the order cost
agreement: Do you agree with our terms?
rent: We have rentals of low tables and gazebos
agree: Do you agree with the price list?
menuOrder: Orders are from the menu only; bringing your own food is prohibited!
serviceCharge: Service charge is 10% of the order cost!
rentalInfo: Grill houses, saunas, karaoke, and various tapchans and gazebos are available for rent according to the price list!
know: To continue, please read our terms and conditions!
vipGazebosr: VIP gazebo medium (up to 15 people) — 2,500 KZT/hour
dishBreakage: Dish breakage: regular — 1,000 KZT, in VIP hall — 3,000 KZT
